website_summaries.verdict: Attractive choice for those desiring a medium-size compact refrigerator for a low price.
pros: Great for customers seeking smaller model
cons: Door stays open unless pushed closed

customer_reviews.title: Are you reading reviews because of your wife too?
customer_reviews.text: Are you reviewing this product because your wife said she’s tired of alcohol taking up space in the fridge? Then look no further than this review! After being threatened with divorce because of my 90 beer cans and bottles lying on top of cheese and eggs, I decided it was time to get a beer fridge. This was a life saver and keeps your alcohol very cold! 32 degrees in fact.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hasson

customer_reviews.title: It is so great. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I read about 50 reviews and finally settled on this fridge for my master bedroom. It is so great. I love it. Quiet, good-looking, sleek, small, holds a lot and very cold. Perfect! Love it. Great value. I think it came in less than 24 hours. Love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Fast Learner

customer_reviews.title: Not a freezer but could be
customer_reviews.text: I like my things cold and honestly did not expect it to be that cold so I set the setting to maximum coldness and was honestly surprised and impressed with it's performance. I found my drinks and milk frozen. Initially there was some humming sound when I initially plugged it in but now it's completely silent. I keep it in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: L. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED Decent price, great beverage cooler, its a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with this purchase, This replaced another one that bit the dust. I have this outside in FL under a large awning by pool and it keeps everything including storage in door ice cold at half setting. It is kept high and dry but outside in heat. No freezer and plenty storage with adjustable glass shelves which is decent for bottle and can storage. Shipped fast and I was impressed with packaging albiet lots of packaging trash but well done!
customer_reviews.author: Stevenator

customer_reviews.title: Dosen't get cold
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these the first didn't get below 40 degrees. We called the company they said to unplug and let it sit for 4 hours then plug in again and this should re set the compressor, it didn't work. I then ordered another and it had the same problem. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A Mossey

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Junk does not even reach 40 degrees with thermostat all the way up
customer_reviews.author: DeeTee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep cool.
customer_reviews.text: Temp doesn’t go below 47°. Ok for drinks, but nothing perishable can be stored.
customer_reviews.author: Bimbo Savant

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order if you want to store food in it. Never gets cold enough...
customer_reviews.text: The first 4.4 one I bought wouldn’t go below 42 degrees. So I notified them and they sent a second one free. The second one had a huge dent on the door and a huge hole in the box when it arrived....and the fridge stayed at 42 degrees. Only thing it’s good for is keeping drinks in it. For 300 dollars I expected top notch. Disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Rodney D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wont uphold the warranty and broke after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: This item started making incredibly loud noises after 2 to 3 months. And it's a mini fridge so I kept in my bedroom. Now I cant have it inside the bedroom because it's so loud. I went to their website to get a replacement fridge or a refund and they have ignored me for over a week after they emailed me asking for information and I gave them all the information they requested. Never buying here again and I suggest you wont. They will not hold up the 1 year warranty and the product had problems like that within 2 months? Of course I cant return it through Amazon and they wont help me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Broke down <6 months of use, horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working less than 6 months after purchase. Still under warranty. Called customer service, submitted requested proof of purchase, still waiting a week later for "approval" to have warranty work done by local repair company. Had the work done. $130 to replace the starter. Unit "works" now but no longer cools adequately. Better to pay a little more money up front that to waste your money on this item. Shame on you Danby!
customer_reviews.author: Eric B Milbrandt

customer_reviews.title: Void Warranty if placed in garage
customer_reviews.text: I received this product, damage free, and placed it in my garage. Plugged it in, but it never once got cold. Called Amazon support and was told to unplug it and let it defrost 24 hours and plug it back in. No change. Called support again and was instructed that I had to call Danby support. Upon calling Danby they notified me that I voided my warranty by placing the unit in my garage and any repairs were at my own cost.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Has been working great! And now that it's no longer needed for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for storing fruit-cups, pudding cups and Ensure nutrition supplement drinks at my mother-in-law's bedside during her stay at the nursing home. Has been working great! And now that it's no longer needed for it's original purpose, we'll use it here at home to keep cold refreshments handy in our Potting Shed during the coming season's yard work and backyard playtime. We purposely bought a unit that has some style knowing it would eventually land at our place -- glad we did!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Great little refrigerator. We needed a place to store cans of soda and bottled water for all the kids and grandkids. It is quiet and keeps everything cold at a pretty low setting. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: Great and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refrigerator for my son who is living in a tent for the summer as a counselor at camp. It is compact and attractive but has really performed fabulously this extremely hot summer at his camp. It is always stocked and each tent has electric use restrictions. This refrigerator is energy efficient- I had to be careful about purchasing the most efficient one due to the restrictions- and he has been able to run this refrigerator and other electrical appliances without going over his energy quota. Highly recommend this very efficient and durable little refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Small Fridge
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is perfect as an adjunct to our full-sized fridge. We use it for beverages, including wine, sodas, beer, and juice. It got cold as soon as I plugged it in and set the thermostat. It is well lit, very roomy, with more than enough room. And it's very attractive and fits nicely in the kitchen. It is slightly under counter height, but fits it well. I got it in red and it is super cute, matching my small red appliances (Kitchenaid mixer, toaster, electric teapot). If you're looking for a small fridge, I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: San Gabriel Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great, but kind of noisy
customer_reviews.text: Fridge looks great, didnt have damage from shipping like some other purchasers, is surprisingly spacious and I do enjoy the light feature. My only qualm is how loud it gets, when the motor is running to cool, it's already kind of noisy but each time it does this there will be a louder semi-high pitched noise that will go for a few seconds or longer then stop very suddenly. Compared to my old compact fridge, this one is a noise maker
customer_reviews.author: T. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Fine little fridge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the smallest (1.7 cu.ft.) size, and it is a perfect fit for all of my essential oils. Seems like a good little refrigerator that does the job, isn't too noisy, etc. I'll update the review if anything goes wrong, but for now and for the price I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and as expected for a small room, tho' it gurgles a bit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mom's room. She's very satisfied with its performance and size. The delivery went without a hitch, the internal temperature is easy to modulate and is consistant (I check it with my handheld IR Thermoworks gauge), and the size and color are exactly what she was wanting. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: chris b

customer_reviews.title: Good and fast response
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a mother day gift for my mom. Her previous wine refrigerator broke and she decided she'd rather have a multi purpose fridge. The only thing she said is she didn't want one with a freezer. I wasn't even aware they made true mini refrigerators like this, I thought they all had those freezers. Anyway this is a good size and holds a ton of stuff. It stays very cold and doesn't have an issue. The shelf was broken upon arrival and I contacted the company for a replacement. I think it arrived within a week and without much effort. They made me happy so still 5 stars despite the hiccup. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to look at and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the most unique looking mini-fridges on the market today, which is what mainly appealed to me. Does its job of keeping drinks/food items cold or chilled. The LED lighting inside is very nice and also a nice feature to have, while other compact refrigerators of this size and price point lack such a feature. As other reviewers mentioned, the item did arrive slightly damaged (mine was on one of the upper corners), but it isn't enough to affect it's visual appeal or to justify me going through the hassle of returning it. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cool below 47 degrees
customer_reviews.text: I, like others, wanted to use this fridge as overflow during Covid quarantine. It was a complete waste of money. Never cools below 47 degrees. Ruined several food items before I purchased 2 thermometers to check the temp. Seriously disgusted that I wasted $166 on a refrigerator that doesn't cool like a refrigerator is supposed to. Save your money and purchase locally so you can return it if it doesn't function.
customer_reviews.author: dhahrangirl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After reading a few of the bad reviews, I was apprehensive but this was exactly what I needed for work. It's completely quiet and there is no freezer to worry about defrosting. I love that it has a light inside and contrary to other reviews, my fridge is very cold (evenly) throughout the fridge. It's the smallest design 1.7 cu.ft. so it would be weird to have "hot spots" in such a small square box. I love it and I'm so glad I bought it. Now I'll probably look into getting a fridge lock.
customer_reviews.author: Sugardoll

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my upstairs bedroom to hold water bottles and I LOVE LOVE it! Gets really really cold and I can store a whole case of 16oz water bottles. I put yogurt cups where they have a spot on the door for a six pack of can soda. Its Very quiet you can't hear a peep. its not an eye sore like some and if you wanted I think you could actually put a small microwave on top. Oh and you can not beat the price $96
customer_reviews.author: Leesa

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep contents properly chilled
customer_reviews.text: This Danby refrigerator leaks water from the interior and does not keep the contents safely chilled despite putting it on the coldest setting (see photos). Thankfully, I purchased a rubber lipped mat to place under it otherwise my hardwood floors would be ruined. I contacted their service service and they said they were working on a replacement, but it has been weeks and I have lost confidence anything will happen. I do not recommend this compact refrigerator and I can only use it now to store beverages. I originally purchased it as an overflow refrigerator for food during the COVID19 Quarantine.
customer_reviews.author: Alexondra

customer_reviews.title: This ain't your normal dorm frig!
customer_reviews.text: This frig is as good as my regular frig! What I LOVE: that retro red color; that the entire thing is a frig without a freezer (those dorm freezers don't work anyway!); the genuis organization built into the frig; easy open and close; matches my tiny, red microwave; does its job; looks handsome just sitting there. What I hate: that I waited so long to buy it! This frig is great. Buy it, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: VT Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great compact fridge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dorm room and it has been working great so far. It get’s very cold inside but hasn’t frozen my milk or any food (I keep the knob at a little past the half point) This fridge is very quiet other than when (i think) the motor starts going but even then its not that loud and only goes on for about a minute. I got the black color and it looks very sleek. Also came very well packaged and no dents.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for wine, beer and soda storage
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this one month, but it seems to be a very nice unit. You cannot hear it running at all. We took out the vegetable and fruit drawer since we use it only for white wine and soda storage. It can fit 5 wine bottles on each of the 3 top shelves and then 10 more vertically on the bottom floor. There is also two door slots to hold tall bottles. The other spaces will then hold 12+ soda or beer cans. It meets my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: David T

customer_reviews.title: It’s what I wanted, but just A  bit bigger next time
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating my review, due to the fact that I didn’t receive the item4.4cf I wanted, it doesn’t mean I didn’t like the item, I was very upset when I wrote the first review... SO JUST TO BE CLEAR, I LOVED THE MINI FRIDGE, (color, performance, no annoying noises) just a bit too small2.6cf) for my taste. I’m still looking forward in resuming business with seller E-shop deals, because for the price it’s worth it. I’m being refunded btw. Soon I’ll get my refund back I’ll buy it, it’s exactly what I’ve been looking for, too bad the red its scarce. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: good looking mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mini fridge that looks good as well. I'm using it for beverage storage and it's just right for that purpose, I like that it's a fridge only, no freezer area taking up space and making parts of the fridge too cold for bottled drinks. The can holder on the door is a nice addition. It's so much better than the top load can dispensers. The shelves are sturdy and easy to clean. Just an all around good fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Best office refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: I love this refrigerator. I waited several months before writing this review so that I had time to really use it. No leaks underneath, it runs very quietly, keeps my stuff nice and cold, and the light inside really sets it apart from most office refrigerators on the market right now. Not having a freezer section at the top is actually a great feature as well bc most of them don't freeze very well and take up valuable refrigerator space.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this fridge. We needed something small but not too small and didn’t want to get one of those half size refrigerators. I also really like that this fridge does not have a freezer in it. That gives more room for what we need. I generally find that freezers in small refrigerators are not the best anyway. The one stand out feature is the overall design. You can tell it was well thought out end it actually looks pretty. That is if the fridge could be pretty! :)
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: Not staying cold
customer_reviews.text: I received this just about a week ago and was so excited because it looks ver cool. I didn't think I would like the black inside. ( I got the white one) it worked well for the first 4 days, then this morning i opened it and it was not cold at all and the milk was spoiled. the light is on so I know it has power but everything is warm... have to contact the manuf but completely disappointed bc with everything going on not sure how to get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the look
customer_reviews.text: I've been through many mini frigdes. At the current stage in my life, I needed one for breastmilk upstairs. I wanted something that fit under a desk and wasn't an eye sore. Overall, I like the look, and I like the extra thought that went into optimizing the space inside this mini fridge. I also appreciate the glass shelves, reversible door, and the light. I do not like it that I have to slowly shut it otherwise it will bounce open. It's annoying enough for me to deduct two stars. Especially considering I've had MANY mini fridges and none had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: cobugi

customer_reviews.title: Clicks and pops
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after purchase the unit would not cool. Danby customer service was slooooow to respond and after a couple of phone calls got it into a repair shop (warranty covered it). Took FOREVER to get a replacement thermostat from Danby. It works but occasionally makes popping sounds in between cycles. Not sure what that is.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this because I wanted to love this Aesthetically pleasing piece. It is just the cutest looking mini fridge. It was scraped and a hole punctured in the outside upon arrival. Unfortunately, It wobbles and I was pretty disappointed. I didn’t want to go through the hassle of return. Noise is low and drinks cold. So I use it for work underneath my desk for my waters.
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: First the fridge was delivered upside down when the box clearly states this side up. I let the fridge sit upright for over 48 hours before plugging in so the oil could drain back down. The fridge Took a long time to cool but then seemed to be working fine. I set it somewhere over medium for temp control but after awhile it stopped cooling as much. I have to have it turned all the way to max cold and it gets somewhere around 58 degrees. Might be a decent fridge if it was delivered correctly. Should have sent back the minute it was delivered upside down.
customer_reviews.author: 2Margaret Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazon and Danby saved the day
customer_reviews.text: I really have to think Amazon and Danby Literally the day my home state issued a stay at home order because of the Covid virus my refrigerator died. It is under warranty but everything is so much more complicated now because of the pandemic. Anyway I ordered this little mini fridge so I could have at least some refrigeration. It arrived a day ahead of schedule.I live on the seventh floor and I am an older woman. I am grateful Amazon delivered it to my doorstep. It is so light I was able to move it into the kitchen myself. Very appreciative.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine O.

customer_reviews.title: small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: what a really nice fridge! I have had 2 others (diff brands) over the past 2 years (they Died) and decided to try this one based on reviews and specifications. This one is quiet, roomy and so far so good it's only been a few months but I really like it and the top of fridge doubles as a cutting board/work surface. I use it in my studio and it's perfect for what I need. I can keep a 1/2 gallon container on the door with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like other viewers only having one adjustable leg and one ...
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed the Danby mini fridge and the D off the Danby logo was broken off and could not find the D anywhere in the packaging. Also there was some scratches on a few places on the front door. Like other viewers only having one adjustable leg and one fixed leg makes no sense to me. I'm using mine on the back patio which is concrete and has a slope. I can adjust leg to level unit but than the fixed leg is to short. So will have to make something makeshift to work. Plugged unit in and starts to cool quick.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Maintains about 37-42 deg F on the coldest setting, which is just about where I want it. Using rubber vibration pads, to keep it from sliding across the tile when opening the door, and to level it a little better. Compressor is noticeable when it comes on. This is used in our kitchen for drinks and fruit, to make more space in our main refrigerator. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great looks on the outside and inside
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to get one of these for so long. They are on the pricey side but worth it. Those no freezer to build frost up on. It comes with a lock which i didn't realize. The bottom veggie drawer is much smaller than my previous which was an RCA. However the design of how the soda cans are stocked is miles better than other. it doesn't shake them because they don't get dropped in to be stacked. I didn't give a star rate on energy because I just got it but I can definitely attest to how cold it can get. Definitely recomend
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Bought to Ferment Beer
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a small fridge to ferment a 5-gallon carboy this is your fridge. Grant it you have to remove the two shelves and you cannot use an airlock that sticks out of the top of your bucket. But it definitely fits the bucket itself no problem. I also used an old plastic orange juice container with a blowout tube and it fits next to the bucket no problem. Once my beer was done fermenting I simply put the shelves back in and loaded it with water, pop and beer. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have had for approximately two months and love it. Using mainly as our beverage fridge and ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had for approximately two months and love it. Using mainly as our beverage fridge and it's great. Fits 2+ cases of beer, plus bottled water on the top, canned juices and fruits in the door and drawer. Perfect for entertaining or when you don't want to tie up your regular fridge with a ton of beverages. Would be perfect for a dorm or tiny house living too. Runs like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Barbara Kight

customer_reviews.title: Great! You have to make sure the shelves are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! You have to make sure the shelves are pushed in to the back of the fridge or it will not keep cold. Also it absolutely has to be 5 inches from any wall - or whatever may be behind it - to keep it running properly. Overall an awesome lil unit!
customer_reviews.author: The Man Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lil fridge
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bedroom and it’s been perfect. I like meal planning and this is the ideal size for it. I can fit my meals and drinks in here and keep a good idea of what’s going into my body all week. I was nervous about it being loud and hearing the cooling element and so far so good! Only heard it faintly kick on one night. Packaged perfectly too.. no damage and not a ton of stuff to recycle. A+ for dorms, bedrooms, or offices.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: working but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received the mini fridge very dented on both sides near the back as though it had been dropped off a truck. Luckily it is working and sits within a slot where the damage can't be seen. Decided to just keep it and not mess with the hassle to return it. I wonder with all the damaged goods I receive these days if the company's just keep sending stuff out this way until they find someone who will accept it!
customer_reviews.author: onederdog

customer_reviews.title: COLD BUT NOISY
customer_reviews.text: I PLACED THIS REFRIGERATOR IN MY BEDROOM FOR CONVENIENT ACCESS TO WATER. WHEN I INITIALLY TURN IT ON IT IS SMOOTH WITH A QUIET HUM. HOWEVER, AFTER ITS BEEN UP AND RUNNING FOR A FEW MINUTES IT BECOMES EXCEPTIONALLY NOISY. IT MAKES CONSTANT GURGLING SOUNDS AND INTERMITANT POPPING SOUNDS. IT DOES KEEP THINGS COLD BUT THE NOISE HAS GOTTEN TO THE POINT WHERE IT IS ON MY LAST NERVE.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great small all refigerator.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking frig. Turned it on and used a frig/freezer thermometer to be sure I got it to the right temp. for the items I was storing in it. Quickly reached the temp. and it is humming (almost totally silently) right along.
customer_reviews.author: Ladibug

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and that about it
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped nicely. Used in a custom Kitchenette and was very ascetically pleasing, until it was time to use the fridge. Initial start up was fine, then we turned off the fridge as we waited to move into the new addition. Once we tried to turn it on again this December (2019) it will not get cold, compressor does not seem to be running but the lights all work. Extremely disappointing considering we had custom cabinets built for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Van Artsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and works great
customer_reviews.text: We have had this frig for about 2 years. It is on our screened porch. It keeps our sodas and water cold, and works perfectly, even through the summer/winter here in SC. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: SCCarrie

customer_reviews.title: Cold and sexy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mini! Ugh. Most every mini fridge is “not cute”. This one is super sexy. lol. Yes. A sexy fridge. The smooth finish, tall slim shape. And the top can be used as a mini bar. I specifically needed a fridge without a freezer. Oh! And most others have a soda can section in the door BUT!! You’re stuck with traditional size cans! A waste of space. THIS ONE is smartly designed. The “soda can” compartment allows for different sizes! Even the extra tall cans! Best fridge ever. We love it. **Accidentally breaking my husband’s ugly mini fridge was a blessing in disguise. Love our new upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: dvswlf

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge - NOT very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a fridge to keep in my office, love the style and size but the thing 'gurgles' 24/7..... if you're not worried about noise this little guy is great - if you need something quiet i would keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roth

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Fridge
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this fridge. It works great and is wonderfully spacious. It is pretty to boot. The shelf is a titch too short to easily store milk in it. It can be done, you just have to tilt the carton to get it past the lip of the shelf above it. We were without a full-size fridge for 12 days and this helped us get by while we were waiting. Now it gets to go to my classroom and be super cool. I ADORE the lock . . . because it will be in a high school classroom . . . aaahhh hungry teenagers. :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Conger

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge but lock broke
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the lock broke so now it’s a pain to open and close but it’s not worth the hassle of returning it. Otherwise, this is a good mini fridge. Works great for our use as a beverage/snack/lunch fridge for our kids. Love the drawer to hold ready to eat fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little frig
customer_reviews.text: Just plugged it in earlier today and so far, so good. I bought this for my college age son to use in his first apartment. This little unit has a ton of space (I did not want a unit with the tiny useless freezer space), I suspect more space than he will use. I plugged it in and had to keep checking to insure it was working - it's that quiet. It's tall rather than square and wide so it should fit into a small space just fine. Great price!! It arrived packaged in a double box with foam inserts and there was no damage what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. It’s on a counter in the garage holding drinks and overflow food items. Seems to run quietly. The one I replaced had a useless little freezer that always froze into a solid block of ice so I’m very happy to have found one without. I like the light and the door is well designed to hold a variety of items.
customer_reviews.author: MSanto

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and spacious
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this little fridge because we were always over stuffing our 32" Samsung. We realized a good deal of space was devoted to items that we didn't use all of the time (mayo's, mustards, sauces, broths, etc.) This fridge has enabled us to move those lesser used items to it, freeing the main fridge for more frequently used items. As a side benefit, I can usually fit a 6 pack of beer in it (used to have to walk to the basement for that) :)
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bleau

customer_reviews.title: Cold Pepsi’s 😁
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my bedroom. I’m in a wheelchair so it’s a little easier to get a cold drink or cold snack. It’s made great glass shelves,L E D lights across the top. I wish they made a Digital thermostat and it would be perfect. Oh yeah can’t forget the sofa holder in the door. It is noisy so I gave a two and a half to three stars but keep it full and it won’t work so hard. I really don’t have any dislikes but maybe I would of had got the next size up. But this one is prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Twice before

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE that it does not have a freezer
customer_reviews.text: I had my last item disappear from the community fridge at work last week. This little gem is sitting behind my chair in my office and it would take Mission Impossible level skills to get anything out of it without me noticing. No damage, no problems, it cooled off completely in under an hour. I LOVE that it does not have a freezer ... no maintenance. Super smart investment on my part.
customer_reviews.author: ceejay

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in the room I was using for hip replacement surgery recovery. I loved the convenience of having my waters and snacks so handy. The fridge arrived in perfect condition exactly when they said it would. Extremely easy to set up (approximately 5-10 mins). I have not noticed any of the noise issues people have commented on, and I sleep very close to this fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great small refrigerator will
customer_reviews.text: A perfect refrigerator for an office where I use it, to store water bottles, lunch components and snacks that require refrigeration. I usually work through lunch and this presents the opportunity to do so. Great product well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Heller

customer_reviews.title: A Really GREAT Little Refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: This review is about the 3.2 cu. ft. "no freezer" model. It is a GREAT little refrigerator! It works flawlessly and is quiet quiet quiet. It came beautifully packaged and was a breeze to unbox. The interior lighting is perfect and the magnetic door catch works flawlessly. I have one complaint: The door has a nifty little interior rack for holding small bottled or canned drinks but I never buy small bottle or canned drinks so it is a bit of wasted space for me. I need to start drinking my beer in cans right?! After checking out the various brands on Amazon I'm really happy that I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: jamie t

customer_reviews.title: After 7 weeks it no longer works
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for approximately 7 weeks. I noticed that for the past 2 weeks my food didn't seem as cold. Now it is barely cold & my milk is spoiled. Terrible low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Annalis

customer_reviews.title: A few dents
customer_reviews.text: Bought the item (returned - good condition) to save a few bucks. It came with minor scratches and a noticeable dent on the lower right side and I had to rebuild the left front toe which was not allowing me to level the fridge. Took out the dent, replaced the toe screw and added a few washers to level it. Saved 40 bucks. Unit is quiet and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fhteacher

customer_reviews.title: No good. It needs a stronger something to stay cooler ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a refrigerator thermometer and the unit has to be turned up three - quarters of the way to stay in the safe zone for refrigeration. No good. It needs a stronger something to stay cooler without cranking up the dial. I don't trust the unit for groceries that require a low temperature to avoid spoilage. Also as a side note the name Danby on the refrigerator door is crooked. It slopes downward to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Bruiser's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Coolant leaked and fridge stopped working after 12 mth
customer_reviews.text: This fridge last just over a year. Over the summer the coolant slowly leaked and the fridge was working harder and harder to keep cold. The end result was complete failure of the refrigeration system that was not worth repairing. I would expect a small fridge like this to have a life time of at least 5 years so definitely did not meet my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Mom2girls

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Bag
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked well for 2 months then failed. Getting warranty coverage was problematic. Danby seemed to want the customer to act like an appliance repairman and go through a convoluted troubleshooting process. I was getting nowhere until I escalated to Amazon. I received a refund which I used to buy the same unit again. The new unit is working well...fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: eShopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappoin
customer_reviews.text: I have had this little refrigerator for 6 months. I live the fact that no space is taken up with a useless freezer compartment. However I noticed that there was water in the bottom of the refrigerator. After emptying out everything, I see that there is ice all over the back of the refrigerator. There is a huge chunk of ice all across the back of the bottom shelf. I will be calling the manufacturer in the mo morning.
customer_reviews.author: Twins Fan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS REFRIGERATOR!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful refrigerator. The red is a candy apple red and it kind of looks retro. It is beautiful and roomy inside too and lights up so pretty when you open the door. So quiet you can't even hear it and it chilled perfectly within a few minutes of turning it on the first time. Love this refrigerator!
customer_reviews.author: Marty T

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, good quality, great value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use on the road as I work across much of the country for a month at a time in each location. Hotel mini-fridge/freezer combinations ruin anything healthy by freezing it regardless of its location in the fridge area. With this all-fridge I’m now able to consistently eat healthier without wasting much food. It does make a small amount of noise when the compressor runs, but you get used to it and hardly notice it after a while. There is a lot of room and it is well lit by the light so you can see everything very well!
customer_reviews.author: Erik C Dean

customer_reviews.title: Does not cool refrigerator to 40 degrees Fahrenheit even at its coldest setting
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a similar all-refrigerator Danby that gave us good service for 15 years. At the mid temperature setting it held the temperature at just below 40 degrees Fahrenheit. This one we have had a month only cools to 44 degrees Fahrenheit even at the maximum cold setting. There was no sign of any damage in shipping, unpacking, or installation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Good little fridge.
customer_reviews.text: We use this to keep our open cans of dog and cat food fresh in our basement, where we feed the critters. We also keep soda cold, near our TV down there. We've had this about 3 months with no problems. It has a lot of capacity for it's size. It doesn't have a freezer compartment, which we don't need. It is not silent, but it is very quiet. Sometimes I'll be near it and wonder what that low-sound is? Then I realize it's this fridge and I don't think about it again, (and our basement is pretty quiet, too.) So the sound shouldn't be an issue for you, except maybe in a bedroom at 3:00 AM!
customer_reviews.author: CG of Vermont

customer_reviews.title: keeps drinks cold, but the shelfs interfere with the door holers
customer_reviews.text: So far it's done what I've wanted, however, I cant put even small water bottles in the slanted door slots without them hitting the shelves and keeping the door open. I've ended up using them to keep oranges and other small fruit in and lining the top shelf with bottles on their sides. Not really ideal.
customer_reviews.author: iceph03nix

customer_reviews.title: Cold w/ Great Features = Nothing if Door Won't Stay Shut
customer_reviews.text: This item was great for all of 3 days after setup. It gets nice and cold and can hold a bunch of drinks. BUT, giant BUT....it doesn't matter if the door won't stay closed. After stock it up and opening and closing a few times, the door stops staying closed and opens after about 5 seconds. This results in the whole thing defrosting and getting water everywhere. Will be calling Danby regarding warranty. Really disappointed. Was going to buy a second one for use in workshop.
customer_reviews.author: JFord913

customer_reviews.title: The perfect little frig tht can hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: I’m in quarantine in my bedroom and this frig was an excellent way to keep food cold n fresh. This is an excellent frig, perfect size. I’m surprised at how muc I can put in it. It’s placed near my bed, for lack of space, but it’s very quiet, never hear it running. Energy efficient, too.
customer_reviews.author: MaryamHajar

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend and he loves it. Says it is so much better in every way than the older one he had that just stopped working. It holds a lot of food but that's because I got it without the ice maker since he already has a freezer. This also looks very nice. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kwanyin

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. My main refrigerator was cluttered with juice boxes, bottles of water, beer and soda cans, bottles of wine and tonic and sodas. This beautiful red refrigerator was just what I wanted. Color is vibrant red. Stays cold, holds lots of bottles and the light is just enough. Goes great in my black, white and red kitchen. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJoanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice item!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly under the desk. No more yucky shared break room fridge for me! I love this little fridge. Nice and cold set on the lowest setting and such a smart design. Saves me time and effort: I carry food to work once or twice a week instead of daily. Makes me able to grocery shop at lunch and park perishables until its time to go home.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Grunner

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: My small office fridge stopped cooling and I needed to replace it. This one seemed to have good reviews, so I bought it. I got it delivered to my office building in just 2 days, and it is perfect. Love the stainless steel retro look and the size is perfect. It is super quiet (my old one was rattling by the end), and it got cold within minutes of turning it on. Really great price too,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Side panel damaged...
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive unit and looks good in the office kitchen. We bought it for drinks (water bottles and canned sodas) and it is a great choice for that. However - when it arrived it has a damaged side. There was only a 1/2 inch foam barrier on the sides in the shipping box but still the damage. Since that side doesn't show and it appears to be working fine,we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, quiet, pretty red refrigerator more spacious than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is really as good as the reviews say it is - spacious, quiet, solid construction, and the red color is aesthetically pleasing. It maintains a good temperature, has a bright interior LED light, and is good for storing both beverages and food.
customer_reviews.author: Joseppi D

customer_reviews.title: Runs cold, runs quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the amount of drinks it holds. We bought it as mainly a drink holder for the garage. If you put the setting all the way up, things will freeze. Found at 80% up the sweet spot for almost frozen drinks. Very quiet. Very nice designer fridge.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of big dents on the corners (Broken plastic, super dented metal, not sure how to upload pics will try to figure out later), scratches inside, huge dents on the bottom. Sure doesn’t seem new, thanks a lot Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Arch3r

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fridge. Bad Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: I like the refrigerator for keeping drinks in the garage. I took 2 stars off because the adjustable foot at the bottom of the refrigerator was bent during shipping and because of this it was impossible to level. I phoned the 800 number to get a replacement and I was left on hold for over an hour listening to the same classical elevator music over and over and over. I finally hung up and put wedges under the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sauvé

customer_reviews.title: Danby 1.7 cu. ft.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for college dorm room. I went with the 1.7 cu. ft. since my daughter only needed it for drinks and some fruit. I read several reviews before purchasing. There was no damage when it arrived. It was not noisy when first plugged in to cool down. It works perfectly. Very happy with this purchase and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great space, little loud.
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy for my liking. Not horrible, but we have this in our living room and you can hear it kick on a lot more than my old unit. Size is good though.
customer_reviews.author: David Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay as cold and generally recommended
customer_reviews.text: Refrigeration is generally recommended to be in the 33F to 38F temperature range. This unit rarely gets under 40F, and typically runs 40F to 42F. I have the dial set on its coldest setting. I am an HVAC engineer, and these temperatures are measured with a highly accurate Bluetooth datalogger that sends me the readings without opening the door. Other than not being cold enough, its seems OK (but that is the primary point). Good in the office to keep drinks cool, and cool your lunch from morning to noon, but not for long term food storage. Food will go bad at an accelerated pace.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Fridge..Spacious..Quality..Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I waited 2 months for this fridge to arrive. After the first month shipping was delayed for another month. When I removed it from the box, there were 3 large dents on both sides of the back edges of the fridge...not dings but dents. Very disappointing. The fridge itself is beautiful, spacious, attractive and quality. It even has a light inside and a large drawer. The inside of the door has useful space. Slightly noisy but not bad. Overall great fridge...worth the wait except for the dents despite seemed was packaged well. Baffled why the dents.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Fabozzi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice little fridge! Exactly as pictured, great quality, and so nice looking!! Was looking for one this size for my office for a while and could not decide which one to get...randomly came across this one and I’m so glad I did! So happy with this purchase! Thank you!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Molly McKeever

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, lot of space
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Mine arrived undamaged, obviously new and was fairly easy to switch up the door on. I'll update if I have any trouble but it's been running (fairly) quiet and keeping cold for normal fridge contents. I dont reccomend putting microwave dinners in though as I'm not sure it's cold enough.
customer_reviews.author: Keaneau

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a dent from the factory
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a dent. I checked the box about where it should be and found no corresponding damage to the box, so I can conclude that this was not done during shipping and must have been put into the box with the dent already on it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyous Wonders

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this Danby fridge. I've had it for a week. The stainless finish is attractive. It was delivered in perfect condition, no dents or scratches. The interior has a light, which most mini fridges don't have. There's can holders and other compartments in the door. It's keeping my food, sodas and water cold. It's in my bedroom; I don't hear the motor. One thing I especially like is the lack of freezer compartment. The reviews of other mini fridges were negative about the frost accumulation. I look at it as more room for drinks. The glass shelves are nice and easy to clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Zee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Beautiful too!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small refrigerator without a freezer for my upstairs in-law apartment. This Danby is perfect. Perfect size with easy to access shelves. Plus the red metallic color is beautiful. Well made and so quiet I don't hear it running at all. It's right in my living area, so that was an essential feature for me. Bottom line, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: june d barnard

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the door was not installed properly and we had to remove it and put it on correctly. It does make some noise when it turns on but it's not that noticeable. It's a great size for my office. I keep water and snacks in it because I can't always leave my desk.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bonfilio

customer_reviews.title: Funny Name
customer_reviews.text: The best mini fridge I have ever seen! It is a 1.7CuFt little fridge! It’s super quiet, it has an inside led light an it fits quite a bit of things for being so small! It is super well made and it has a working top. You can even fit a big 2 liter bottle of soda on the door. It Is impressive for its small size. If you do not like to cut corners and like high end appliances! This is the one for you!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for keeping my stuff fresh and decluttered
customer_reviews.text: I have roommates currently, and needed this so we all had our own space for groceries and left-overs without piling on top of each other. Just right for keeping my special supplies separate and easy to get to.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Ink

customer_reviews.title: Locking Mechanism is a JOKE
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of this mini fridge and appreciate the temperature control and the interior light. However, I picked this particular item because it claimed to have a lock. The "lock" is nothing more than a standard hex socket and it can be unlocked by simply sliding your finger under the door to turn the latch. I could have purchased a similar fridge for FAR less money without the "lock". I am extremely disappointed in this feature.
customer_reviews.author: SSimages

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Inside it’s cool enough. Make a little noise and tremble a little. I put it on lower shelf of my desk and it feels like a gentle foot massage. But I guess it’s normal for a fridge. The remaining one star will be gained by durability, which needs time to approve.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Last time buying major appliance online...
customer_reviews.text: Got this mini fridge from Amazon, arrived heavily dented, even cracked in a corner as if dropped on it from some decent height, basically way beyond scratch and dent level. Seems 2 be working though and don't feel loke repacking this big lil bad boy so I'll just unhappily keep it, but live and learn
customer_reviews.author: JoeBlow

customer_reviews.title: No rated temperature on sale literature.
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator would not cool any colder than 50F. I used a high quality thermometer to measure the temp. I called Danby and they said that is what it’s rated for. 50F is not a safe temperature for food and is hardly acceptable for soda or beer. A refrigerator should be able to cool to 38F. Never buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gladman

product_meta.title: Danby DAR017A3BDB Contemporary Classic Compact All Refrigerator, Black
feature_bullets: Integrated Door Shelving with Tall Bottle Storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,123 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
